"Items You Cannot Carry": "Sometimes you will receive items automatically, such as when you successfully complete an Emergency Code. If you exceed the item limit or your inventory is full, then any items you cannot carry will automatically be sent to your Storage."
"Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones. My fears were completely unfounded, then."
"You can only carry so many items at one time, but if you use your Storage from time to time, you can avoid drowning in your own junk."
"The default Storage can hold up to 200 items, but if you expand it, it becomes even more useful."
